title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

genre.description: A style of storytelling that aims to elicit excitement, tension, suspense, and a high level of anticipation.

title: Akira
description: In a post-apocalyptic Tokyo, a young biker named Kaneda discovers government secrets while searching for his kidnapped friend.

genre.name: Animation
genre.description: A film genre characterized by the use of animation.

title: The Fountain
description: The Fountain is a tale of a man traveling through time, as a 16th-century conquistador, a 21st-century scientist, and a future astronaut, to save the woman he loves.

genre.name: Drama
genre.description: A genre that explores realistic human emotions and interactions.

title: Pi
description: The story of a paranoid mathematician who believes there are patterns everywhere in nature, leading him on a descent into obsession and madness.

genre.name: Drama
genre.description: Drama films feature complex characters and relationships.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of astronauts undertake a mission through a time-warping wormhole near Saturn in a quest to find humanity a new home across the cosmos.

genre.name: Sci-Fi
genre.description: Science fiction films depict futuristic or imagined worlds.

title: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets leads a last heist to secure his freedom.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: Action films emphasize intense physical activity and conflict.

title: Lost in Translation
description: A fading actor and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond in Tokyo.

genre.name: Drama
genre.description: Dramatic storytelling with emotional narrative focus.

title: Psycho
description: A secretary embezzles money and checks into a remote motel run by a disturbed innkeeper.

director.name: Alfred Hitchcock
director.bio: Alfred Hitchcock was an English film director and producer, widely regarded as one of the most influential figures in the history of cinema. His career spanned six decades, becoming best known for his suspenseful and psychological thrillers.

genre.name: Thriller
genre.description: Thriller films use suspense to thrill the audience.

title: The Birds
description: A series of sudden and unexplained violent bird attacks terrorize the people of Bodega Bay.

director.name: Alfred Hitchcock
director.bio: Alfred Hitchcock was an English film director and producer, widely regarded as one of the most influential figures in the history of cinema. His career spanned six decades, becoming best known for his suspenseful and psychological thrillers.

genre.name: Thriller
genre.description: Films that often feature psychological twists and suspense.

title: Juliette of the Spirits
description: A surreal tale of a woman named Juliette who, amidst a failing marriage, seeks answers through spiritual mediums and her own subconscious.

genre.name: Drama
genre.description: Dramas often deal with significant life themes and psychological states.
